short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows the latest COVID active cases Data & vaccination data for Jersey

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a simple extension that displays the latest published numbers for active cases, symptomatic cases and number of active case's contacts as well as vaccination data. You can also see the positive or negative changes on each data point based on the previous Government update. 

The data comes from the Jersey Government's website (gov.je)
